summary: Project includes a targeted bugfix: ensure user files/links/notes in folders transfer correctly and immediately to a mission when the user chooses to move them from a folder, with no other app/functionality changes.
architectural_notes: Scope constraint: apply only the folderâ†’mission transfer fix; no other changes to app features/behavior.
known_issues: Bug: Files/links/notes stored in folders do not transfer correctly/immediately to a mission when moved from a folder.

existing_features.title: Fix the "move to mission" flow so that when a user moves items from a folder to a mission, the moved files (including link-items stored as FileMetadata) appear in the target mission immediately and are removed from the source folder immediately, without requiring a manual refresh or navigation away/back.

Fix the "move to mission" flow so that when a user moves notes from a folder to a mission, the moved notes appear in the target mission immediately and are removed from the source folder immediately, without requiring a manual refresh or navigation away/back.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix: When user moves items (files, links, notes) from folders to a mission, they must transfer correctly and immediately; do not change any other app behavior.

Ensure backend move operations correctly detach moved items from folders when moving them to missions: (a) files/links moved to a mission must have folderId cleared and missionId set, and (b) notes moved to a mission must have folderId cleared and missionId set (and any location/fileLocation fields updated consistently if used by the app).

projectName: Fix moving files/links/notes from folders to missions (immediate + correct transfer)
